@METROID 2.0 this story type of netorare is different from all netorare story,  this MC,  even if weak physically,  he has "Power" that is in a form of owning property. But he didn't  use his advantages.  In every NtR story,  the MC is weak physically,  mentally,  and financial.  But this guy has one advantages,  and he didn't use it,  he burn it instead.  That's  the definition of dumb.

@METROID 2.0 funny,  did you not read my whole comment,  you just some lazy ass who loves looking for trouble.  If i can't  separate fiction from real life,  then i wouldn't gave a normal reaction IMO for the MC in the story.  Most story,  we can derive some or few meaning that we can use in real life,  even if the story is a hentai.  In my conclusion,  i commend this author for a good art style,  but he seems like to end his/her story in a not making sense ending. 
You burn your own mansion just for a broken heart with a woman?  I mean i get it that it feels hurt like a hell,  but it still not making sense,  maybe he aim for comedic ending,  but failed the purpose.  I just had a dry laugh reading the ending.  I give one good example for comedy hentai author.  Kon-kit can makes me Laughing out loud reading it.  And there is netorare element too in his/her works.  But he/she also succeed to entertain and makes you laugh.  What i am saying is,  i don't  hate this works.
